POST: http://localhost:3000/api/v1/vendor/vehicle/comment
Header param: token
body:
vehicle_id:7
user_id:2
message:Its a great

response:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "id": 2,
        "vehicle_id": "7",
        "user_id": "2",
        "message": "Its a great",
        "updatedAt": "2022-02-11T12:30:13.151Z",
        "createdAt": "2022-02-11T12:30:13.151Z"
    },
    "error": false,
    "message": "Successfully inserted comments."
}
